results.name: Triangle T(n,k) giving number of 2 X k polyominoes with n cells (n >= 2, 1<=k<=n-1).
link: R. C. Read, Contributions to the cell growth problem, Canad. J. Math., 14 (1962), 1-20. See Eq. (8.5) for g.f..
mathematica: coes = CoefficientList[#, x]& /@ CoefficientList[gf + O[y]^(rows+2), y];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 2, rows+1}, {k, 1, n-1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 12 2017, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 05 2001
